column5: We were out on Simcoe early this morn to get some smallies.  Got several smallies but no real monsters.  My largest today was a 3 pounder and my buddy managed a 4 pounder.  It is kind of funy that I no longer think of 4 pound smallies as monsters.  I guess that is what Simcoe will do for you.  Too many 5+ pounders around. We are spoiled. Anyway, on a side note the perch were smacking our lures.  I have literally caught a thousand perch in my life and I honestly believe that this is my PB.  It measured 13.5" long and I weighed it on my digital scale and it weighed exactly 1.25 pounds.  1 pound 4 ounces is not too bad.  The fish was very fat.  My largest smallie of the day, 3 pounds caught before 6 am.   My buddies largest smallie of the day, 4 pounds.   My PB perch   Again with a tape measure
2 more of those and you have a meal!
WOW. Now that is a beautiful jumbo if ever I saw one... nice job!!!
nice  almost went out this am as well , but chickened out last minute . worked instead  TB
Nice my PB perch was on Simcoe icefishing this year, it was 11.5", but yours is really something else! Great catch!
One of these days you are finally going to hit an old 15" sow out there.
Work is for losers.  Just kidding. It actually trned out to be quite a nice morning despite the weather report.
Thought for a minute you may have caught a record size perch but sorry it isn'tperch at bottom of list  However it sure is a big one! Congratulations....now how did it taste?
WOW, are you that 'perch' is not a small badd wearing the wrong outfit?  Congrats!
lol!  It took me a while to figure out what you were asking here???? your badd should have read bass.  lol
Wow, monster pearch, congrats on the PB.
Beauty Cudz    Congratulations But do me a fever.... next time, SMILE for the camera LOL  Just Kidding LOL  Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
Gotta love Lady Simcoe.  Ton a Jumbos.  That’s a nice one.  Last winter I had (x2) 12”ers  on the line at the same time.  Almost felt like a small whitie.  (very small whitie)
